# ðŸŒ¹ @sharyn/tags

No-op ES6 template string tags to enable syntax highlighting in editors.

## Installation

```sh
npm i @sharyn/tags
# or
yarn add @sharyn/tags
```

You can alternatively install the entire [**sharyn**](https://github.com/sharynjs/sharyn#getting-started) library or individual modules.

- [**html**](https://github.com/sharynjs/sharyn/tree/master/packages/tags.html/README.md#readme) â€“ A template string tag for HTML syntax highlighting
